alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Jackson; Ouachita (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 05 at 4:30AM CDT until April 05 at 4:45AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 AM CDT FOR NORTHERN CALDWELL...SOUTHEASTERN JACKSON AND SOUTHEASTERN OUACHITA PARISHES... At 429 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Galion to 7 miles southeast of Bastrop to near Swartz to 13 miles northwest of Columbia, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Monroe, Swartz, Richwood, Fondale, Bosco, Pine Grove, Riverton and Millhaven. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CDT for north central Louisiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
